fields.title: Your own About The Author
fields.assignment_instructions: You must write your own About the Author. However, you must do so in a purposefully awful way. Like Dave, your about the author must spiral so out of control that you decided to go back in time and delete it. Linger on the effects of your decision and convey your own beliefs about the idea of eliminating your past mistakes.

fields.title: Character Analysis
fields.assignment_instructions: Pick the character you find the most interesting from the power rankings list. Guess various details about their lives. Guess their favorite restaurants, eneagram, and holidays. Explain your answers.

fields.title: Death Pool
fields.assignment_instructions: Which characters are dying in the next book and why?
